summary.para: The OCSP_REQUEST_INFO structure contains information for an online certificate status protocol (OCSP) request as specified by RFC 2560. The RFC specifies that a single request can contain a sequence of certificates for which statuses are required. The rgRequestEntry member of this structure contains an structure for each certificate in a sequence.
A value that indicates the protocol version of the OCSP request.
A pointer to a structure that contains the name bound to the certificate public key of the requester.
The number of elements in the rgRequestEntry array.
An array of pointers to structures.
The number of elements in the rgExtension array.
An array of pointers to structures, each of which contains information about the request.
